snippet: When Marques Colston, a Hofstra alumnus, passed 1,000 yards receiving for the season Sunday, it was the fifth time in his six years that he accomplished the feat.
abstract: When Marques Colston, a Hofstra alumnus, passed 1,000 yards receiving for the season Sunday, it was the fifth time in his six years that he accomplished the feat.
lead_paragraph: With all the late-season record chasing by Drew Brees, Darren Sproles, Jimmy Graham and the Saints' offense as a whole, wide receiver Marques Colston remained under the radar, as usual. But when Colston, the quiet Hofstra alumnus, passed 1,000 yards receiving for the season Sunday against Carolina, it was the fifth time in his six years that he had accomplished the feat.
